author: GameSpot
description:
I long to meet you, in a charming little town.
Rounding street corners, climbing treetops, zipping through alleys.
Hiding on shelves for a secret peek, weaving between the feet of passersby, swishing my tail to the music, brushing past with a swagger.
Waves lap lazily at the shore as sunset cautiously nestles onto the rooftops. The time on the wall ticks audibly, from dawn till dusk.
Waiting for you to turn around, waiting to meet your gaze.
The moment we meet, sundered bonds will be mended anew.
The eighty-one Planes all shine for you.
title: Honkai: Nexus Anima - Nexus Bond Teaser Trailer | Side by Side

author: GameSpot
description:
Check out 29 minutes of Phantom Blade 0 gameplay from gamescom 2025. The weapon loadout features the White Serpent and Crimson Viper, Seamless Death, Ink Cut, and Night Owl bow. The loadout does switch a bit later on to the Juggernaut and the Soft Snake Sword, as well as using the Bashpole once it becomes available upon defeating the first of two bosses in this gameplay clip. See timestamps below for more specific moments in the gameplay.

Timestamps: 
0:00 Intro
0:09 Combat and Exploration in First Area
10:07 Second Area
13:32 Wan Jun "Coppermaul" Boss Fight
16:15 More Combat and Exploration
23:17 Chief Disciple of Seven Stars Boss Fight

#phantomblade0 #gaming
title: Phantom Blade 0 - 29 Minutes of Gameplay (Gamescom 2025 Demo)

author: GameSpot
description:
Max gets three hours of hands on time with S-Game's upcoming action game Phantom Blade 0 on the hardest difficulty, Hellwalker. We break down how combat works and discuss the Hellwalker's unique angle of difficulty they went for.

#phantomblade0 #gaming
title: Phantom Blade 0 - Hard Mode, Combat, And More Explained
